dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.root.ch.CharacteristicSpecRelationship
dataStructure.description:
A aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency, or exclusivity relationship between/among CharacteristicSpecifications.A aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency, or exclusivity relationship between/among CharacteristicSpecifications.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: CharacteristicSpecRelationship

child.name: charRelationshipType
child.description:
A categorization of the relationship, such as aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency, exclusivity.A categorization of the relationship, such as aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency, exclusivity.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: charRelationshipType

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the relationship is applicable.The period for which the relationship is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: charSpecSeq
child.description:
The order in which a CharacteristicSpecification appears within another CharacteristicSpecification that defines a grouping of CharacteristicSpecifications. For example, a grouping may represent the name of an individual. The given name is first, the middle name is second, and the last name is third. The order in which a CharacteristicSpecification appears within another CharacteristicSpecification that defines a grouping of CharacteristicSpecifications. For example, a grouping may represent the name of an individual. The given name is first, the middle name is second, and the last name is third.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: charSpecSeq
